about: I am a Java backend developer specializing in cloud-based SaaS applications, with a focus on performance, scalability, and accessibility.

Over the past few years, I’ve contributed to enterprise grade projects in fintech, data analytics, and AI-driven platforms. My expertise lies in Java, Spring Boot, REST/GraphQL APIs, and microservices architectures, with strong proficiency in AWS cloud environments.
Whether optimizing data pipelines, refactoring legacy systems, or designing new integrations, I bring a problem-solving mindset and a commitment to delivering robust solutions.
In my spare time, I love homebrewing, crafting ales and lagers that make gatherings with friends and family special. Among my brews, the Smoked Baltic Porter stands out as my signature recipe.

experience.description: Built and enhanced mission‑critical financial SaaS features, improving system reliability for millions of users. Refactored legacy integrations and unit tests, reducing CI/CD pipeline failures by 30%. Maintained AWS Aurora RDS clusters, ensuring disaster recovery planning at upgrades.
experience.stack: Java, Spring, REST/GraphQL, TigerGraph, AWS Aurora RDS MySQL, Jenkins, Docker, Argo CD, Splunk, Wavefront, OpenTelemetry
